SEARCH

Class BankUI

java.lang.Object
BankUI
public class BankUI extends Object
The BankUI class serves as a helper class for the Bank class. It handles all the UI elements of the Bank application

    • createCreditCard

      public static void createCreditCard()
      Prints out to the user to enter the information needed for creating a credit card It will then take the information and create the Credit Card using the external component.

    • register

      public static void register(Bank bank)
      Handles the registration process of a new user. Prints the prompts for the user and creates a new user using the information provided.
      Parameters:
      bank - The active Bank instance

    • login

      public static void login(Bank bank)
      Handles the login process of the Bank application. Prints the prompts for the user and passes the information onto the Customer class. Advances the menu upon a successful login.
      Parameters:
      bank - The active Bank instance

    • printAdminMenu

      Parameters:

    • performTransfer

      public static void performTransfer(Bank bank, Account loggedInAccount)
      Handles the Money Transfer operation. Asks the user prompts and transfers the money using the Bank class
      Parameters:
      bank - The active Bank instance
      loggedInAccount - The active user's account

    • updateTransferLimit

      public static void updateTransferLimit(Account loggedInAccount)
      Handles the updating of transfer limit operation. Prompts the user for input and updates the limit through the account class.
      Parameters:
      loggedInAccount - The active user's account

    • performDeposit

      public static void performDeposit(Account loggedInAccount)
      Handles the deposit operation. Prompts the user the amount to deposit and deposit it through the account class
      Parameters:
      loggedInAccount - The active user's account

    • performWithdrawal

      public static void performWithdrawal(Account loggedInAccount)
      Handles the withdrawal operation. Prompts the user the amount to withdraw and withdraws it through the account class
      Parameters:
      loggedInAccount - The active user's account

    • createLoan

      public static void createLoan(Account loggedInAccount)
      Handles the creation of loans. Prompts the user for the loan details and calls the external loan component with the information provided.
      Parameters:
      loggedInAccount - The active user's account

    • payLoan

      public static void payLoan(Account loggedInAccount)
      Handles the payment of loan operation. Prompts the user for the amount to pay the loan and pays the loan using the external loan component.
      Parameters:
      loggedInAccount - The active user's account

    • transactMenu

      customer - The active Customer
      accNum - The account number of the account
